nodes.text: OreDiggers were MG-100 StarFortress SF-17 bombers modified for mining. They were used by Central Ridge Mining, a mining company based on the planet Hays Minor. When the First Order took over the planet, the OreDiggers were equipped with a powerful laser, and used to mine directly through Hays Minor's crust to extract minerals, tearing the planet apart.

OreDiggers were extensively modified MG-100 StarFortress SF-17 bombers used by Central Ridge Mining based on Hays Minor. When the First Order blockaded the system, Captain Wolstenholme was sent to oversee direct mining operations on the planet.
